fr.escape.graphics

Class ScrollingTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.graphics.ScrollingTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextureOperator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepeatableScrollingTexture

    public class ScrollingTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextureOperator

    A TextureOperator which handle scroll features for a Texture.

    For scrolling, use setXPercent(float) or setYPercent(float) for X or Y axis. Percent must be between 0 and 1. If you want to progress by 1%, call these with lastPercent+0.01.

    See Also:
    TextureOperator

        Draw a Scrollable Texture defined by setXPercent(float) and setYPercent(float)

        Specified by:
        draw in interface TextureOperator
        Parameters:
        graphics - Use this Graphics2D for drawing.
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen.
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen.
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen.
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen.
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree (Optional)
